design_strategy.core_philosophy: Tactical Minimalism. High contrast, dense data, zero fluff. The interface should feel like a piece of high-end gym equipment.

headings.usage: All section headers, stats numbers, and hero text.

mono.usage: Timers, code snippets, specific data values.

rules: Use 'Electric Blaze' (#F97316) sparingly for CTAs and active states.
Backgrounds must be deep zinc/black, never pure black (#000000) unless for OLED optimization.
NO GRADIENTS on buttons. Flat, high-contrast colors only.

layout.spacing: Generous padding (p-6, p-8) inside containers, tight gaps (gap-4) between data points.
layout.border_radius: rounded-sm (2px) or rounded-none. Avoid large rounded corners.
layout.container_style: Flat background with 1px border. No shadows in dark mode, use border color changes for depth.

buttons.style: Sharp edges or pill-shaped. High contrast text.
buttons.hover: Brightness up or subtle lift. No shadow.

inputs.style: bg-input border-transparent focus:border-primary focus:ring-1 focus:ring-primary rounded-sm

navigation.style: Sidebar or bottom nav (mobile). Glassmorphism allowed here only: backdrop-blur-xl bg-background/80 border-t border-white/10.

visual_enhancers.textures: Use a subtle noise texture overlay on the background (opacity 0.03) to reduce digital flatness.
visual_enhancers.motion: Fast, snappy transitions (0.2s ease-out). No slow drifts.
visual_enhancers.data_viz: Use Recharts. Minimalist lines, glowing dots for current values.

hero_motivation.usage: Landing page hero, Profile header background

equipment_detail.alt: Dumbbell close up black and white

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add the Google Fonts link to the <head> of index.html immediately.
2. CONFIGURE TAILWIND: Update tailwind.config.js to extend the font family with 'Barlow Condensed' and 'Manrope'.
3. OVERRIDE CSS VARS: Update index.css with the provided color palette variables for .dark class (and default root to dark values if forcing dark mode).
4. FORCE DARK MODE: Ensure the app defaults to dark mode. Add 'dark' class to html or body tag.
5. BUILD LAYOUTS: Use the 'Bento Grid' philosophy. Don't just stack divs. Create interesting asymmetrical grids.
6. USE SHADCN: Use the existing shadcn components but style them via className to match the 'Sharp/Tactical' aesthetic (remove rounded-lg, use rounded-sm).
7. DATA-TESTID: Add data-testid to all interactive elements.
8. NO LOREM IPSUM: Use realistic fitness data (e.g., 'Bench Press: 100kg', 'Protein: 180g').
universal_guidelines: Create depth through z-index and subtle borders, not heavy shadows.
Use the provided image URLs. Do not use placeholders.
